decoworld.model.world.worlditems

Class DestructibleItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.entities.WorldEntity
      • decoworld.model.world.entities.combat.StatEntity
        • decoworld.model.world.worlditems.DestructibleItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasSync, HasCollision, HasStats, StatListener, HasPhysicsBox, HasLocation, HasRotation, WorldItem, java.lang.Iterable<StatType>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DestructibleJar

    public class DestructibleItem
extends StatEntity
implements HasPhysicsBox, HasCollision
    Destructible Item Class. This item is designed to block the players advance through the level, yet it is destructible. This object is meant to be able to be collided with, have a health stat and a physics box. When the player hits the item, the health will decrement until it is dead.

    Current Functionality: - Takes damage by being run into by the player (easily updatable to take damage from more specific items) - Image changes as the item takes damage - Upon full damage, the item disappears completely. - Currently doesn't respawn in its place.

    Created by jason on 18/08/14. Modified by sarahnelson on 16/10/2014.

    Updated Functionality: - Is a DestructibleItem class rather than a DestructibleBoulder class and can be used to make any kind of destructible item.
